content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let me emphasize that during our discussion today we shall solely focus on the rental price. Now, if you'd like to propose a figure, please go ahead. If we reach an agreement on the price, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Should we not find common ground, I'll indicate the reason for ending the negotiation. Thank you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I will start with an offer of 500 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't find your initial offer competitive enough for my premium property, Maryam. I'll pass on this proposal. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
